text.div:
This code system http://hlth.gov.bc.ca/fhir/client/CodeSystem/bc-client-registry-address-validation-code-system defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
valid validThe address is valid, i.e. there is a reasonable good chance this address is known to Canada Post.
invalid invalidThe address validation status is invalid and like not recognized by Canada Post.
unknown unknownThe address validation status is unknown.

name: BCAddressValidationCS
title: BC Client Registry Address Validation Status Code
description: Codes used to define the address validation status.

concept.definition: The address is valid, i.e. there is a reasonable good chance this address is known to Canada Post.
The address validation status is invalid and like not recognized by Canada Post.
The address validation status is unknown.
